statue_up@blizzard.desc[1]: A huge stone statue of a sorceror stands proudly against the north wall.
statue_up@blizzard.name: statue_up
statue_up@blizzard.examine:
You see a large marble statue of a mighty sorcerer, though its features have
been misfigured by passing adventurers.
statue_up@blizzard.desc[0]: A huge stone statue of a sorceror stands here, beside a hole leading down.

scarlet@blizzard.name: scarlet
scarlet@blizzard.desc[0]: A scarlet robe has been neatly folded and left here.

necklace@blizzard.name: necklace
necklace@blizzard.desc[0]: A beautiful necklace has been left here.

bridge_fire@blizzard.name: Bridge_Fire
bridge_fire@blizzard.examine: It's just a bridge over VERY troubled waters!
bridge_fire@blizzard.desc[0]: A huge iron drawbridge crosses the lava to the east.

pick@blizzard.name: pick
pick@blizzard.desc[0]: A small but well made ice pick has been dropped here.

soap@blizzard.name: soap
soap@blizzard.examine: Stamped in the soap are the strange runes "Neutrogena"
soap@blizzard.desc[0]: Some soap has been dropped here.

rod@blizzard.name: rod
rod@blizzard.desc[0]: A black rod marked with a red pentacle has been placed here.

moonstone@blizzard.name: moonstone
moonstone@blizzard.desc[0]: A huge moonstone lies in front of you.

bridge_hall@blizzard.name: Bridge_Hall
bridge_hall@blizzard.examine: It's just a bridge over troubled waters....
bridge_hall@blizzard.desc[0]: A huge iron drawbridge crosses the lava to the west.

coins@blizzard.name: coins
coins@blizzard.desc[0]: A few copper coins lie scattered on the ground.

powerstone2@blizzard.name: powerstone2
powerstone2@blizzard.desc[0]: A magical powerstone has been placed here.

scimitar@blizzard.name: scimitar
scimitar@blizzard.examine:
This is a hefty and gruesome weapon, much favoured by orcs, who often use them
for cutting cakes, trimming toe nails, and ripping out the insides of hobbits!
scimitar@blizzard.desc[0]: A long, curved scimitar has been placed here.

riatha_fire@blizzard.name: Riatha_Fire
riatha_fire@blizzard.examine: It looks a trifle hot for any mortal to handle.

runesmagic@blizzard.name: RunesMagic
runesmagic@blizzard.examine:
The runes are apparently part of an educational guide to spell casting and
list several basic pieces of magic.  These are:

                DEAF, MUTE, CRIPPLE, BLIND and CURE

The runes also allude to a spell for summoning people, SUMMON, but
note that several amulets and talismans can protect the victim from
its effects.
        A spell for finding the exact locations of players, objects
and mobiles, WHERE, is also mentioned.

pumice@blizzard.name: pumice
pumice@blizzard.desc[0]: A piece of pumice has been discarded here.

signbridge@blizzard.name: SignBridge
signbridge@blizzard.desc[0]: A sign has been posted by the bridge.

scroll@blizzard.name: scroll
scroll@blizzard.desc[0]: A battered papyrus scroll has been dropped here.

brick@blizzard.name: brick
brick@blizzard.examine: The brick looks like it can be pushed.

shield2@blizzard.name: shield2
shield2@blizzard.desc[0]: A small wooden shield has been left here.

pillar_east@blizzard.name: pillar_east
pillar_east@blizzard.desc[0]: A huge stone pillar bridges the gap to the west.

orange_gem@blizzard.name: Orange_Gem
orange_gem@blizzard.desc[0]: A small orange gem has been dropped here.

broom@blizzard.name: broom
broom@blizzard.examine:
It has a Mark IV Super-Demon engine, unfortunately out of order, and looks as
if its been kick started once too often..
broom@blizzard.desc[0]: An old broom has been left here.

rough_curtains@blizzard.desc[1]: To the south the passage passes through some curtains.
rough_curtains@blizzard.name: Rough_Curtains
rough_curtains@blizzard.examine: They aren't the sort you'd expect to find a peeping Tom behind.
rough_curtains@blizzard.desc[0]: To the south the passage leads into a curtained hall.

coinplat@blizzard.name: CoinPlat
coinplat@blizzard.desc[0]: A few small platinum coins have been dropped here.

bookcase@blizzard.name: bookcase
bookcase@blizzard.examine: You see shelves of books.  What else did you expect, a secret passage?

snow_iceb@blizzard.desc[1]: Ice-encrusted snow is piled up against one ruined wall.
snow_iceb@blizzard.name: snow_iceb
snow_iceb@blizzard.desc[0]: A hole has been chipped through the ice that covered a stairway leading down.

pillar_west@blizzard.desc[1]: A huge stone pillar lies fallen on the floor.
pillar_west@blizzard.name: pillar_west
pillar_west@blizzard.desc[0]: A huge stone pillar bridges the gap and allows you to go east.

orb@blizzard.name: orb
orb@blizzard.desc[0]: A glowing white orb pulsates before you.

bridge_lever@blizzard.name: Bridge_Lever
bridge_lever@blizzard.examine: This lever would seem to operate the drawbridge.

knife@blizzard.name: knife
knife@blizzard.desc[0]: A small, curved surgeon's knife has been dropped here.

shield1@blizzard.name: shield1
shield1@blizzard.desc[0]: A heavy painted shield has been dropped here.

ball@blizzard.desc[1]: A crystal ball has been placed here, glowing a pale red.
ball@blizzard.desc[3]: A crystal ball has been placed here, glowing a pale green.
ball@blizzard.name: ball
ball@blizzard.desc[2]: A crystal ball has been placed here, glowing a pale blue.
ball@blizzard.desc[0]: A crystal ball has been placed here.

harp@blizzard.name: harp
harp@blizzard.desc[0]: A beautiful golden harp has been placed here.

lever@blizzard.name: lever
lever@blizzard.desc[0]: A heavy iron lever is set into the south wall.

rations1@blizzard.name: rations1
rations1@blizzard.desc[0]: Some old rations have been left here.

reset_stone@blizzard.name: Reset_Stone
reset_stone@blizzard.examine:
The ancient runes, battered as they are, indicate that the stone can be
struck to reset the game.
reset_stone@blizzard.desc[0]:
A huge stone stands in the center of the clearing, 
its sides strangely marked and scored.

stick@blizzard.desc[1]: An old stick lies on the ground.
stick@blizzard.name: stick
stick@blizzard.desc[0]: A burning stick lies on the ground.

bag@blizzard.name: bag
bag@blizzard.desc[0]: A small bag has been dumped in one corner.

altar@blizzard.name: altar
altar@blizzard.desc[0]: The altar has been pushed to the side.

garland@blizzard.name: garland
garland@blizzard.examine:
You see written on it, in small flowing letters, the words....
                'Judy'
garland@blizzard.desc[0]: A beautiful garland of flowers sends a sweet smell wafting around you.

powerstone@blizzard.name: powerstone
powerstone@blizzard.desc[0]: A magical powerstone has been put here by someone.

littablet@blizzard.name: littablet
littablet@blizzard.examine:
The tablet describes a light spell.

There's a note...it says learn basic spells cheap!  Inquire at the General
Store in the village.
littablet@blizzard.desc[0]: An ancient tablet has been discarded here.

rations@blizzard.name: rations
rations@blizzard.desc[0]: Some rations have been left here, old but edible.

hole_gallery@blizzard.name: Hole_Gallery
hole_gallery@blizzard.examine: How can you examine a hole, there's nothing there to examine!
hole_gallery@blizzard.desc[0]: A hole allows you to go west.

talisman@blizzard.name: talisman
talisman@blizzard.desc[0]: A battered silver talisman has been dumped here.

obsidian@blizzard.name: obsidian
obsidian@blizzard.desc[0]: A large, gleaming piece of obsidian lies on the ground.

wintergreen@blizzard.desc[1]: Peeking out of the snow you spy some wintergreen.
wintergreen@blizzard.name: wintergreen
wintergreen@blizzard.examine:
As you examine the sprig of wintergreen, you break a leaf, releasing the
delicious aroma of fresh mint.
wintergreen@blizzard.desc[0]: A sprig of wintergreen has been left here.

ironbar@blizzard.name: IronBar
ironbar@blizzard.desc[0]: An iron bar is set into the wall.

worn@blizzard.name: worn
worn@blizzard.desc[0]: A rather worn robe lies here tatty and fraying.

key@blizzard.]: A small silver key has been dropped here.
key@blizzard.name: key

blackrobe@blizzard.name: BlackRobe
blackrobe@blizzard.examine:
The robe has two silver lightning bolts enscribed on the back... do you think
it belonged to Captain Marvel?
blackrobe@blizzard.desc[0]: A black robe with two silver lightning bolts down the back has been put here.

tripwire@blizzard.name: tripwire
tripwire@blizzard.examine:
You see a highly coloured, multi dimensional trip wire, though it is obviously
harmless to those that have seen it.
tripwire@blizzard.desc[0]: There is a tripwire stretched out across the passage.

branch_village@blizzard.desc[1]: An old branch has been dropped here.
branch_village@blizzard.name: branch_village
branch_village@blizzard.desc[0]: A burning branch has been left here.

throne_curtains@blizzard.name: Throne_Curtains
throne_curtains@blizzard.examine:
These are made of the best quality velvet, but are so large and heavy that
only immortals may carry them out of the chamber.
throne_curtains@blizzard.desc[0]: A narrow passage leads north, through a gap in the curtains.

volume@blizzard.name: volume
volume@blizzard.examine:
The first secret of Knowledge is that 'where' regards the true name of
all the volumes of the Book of Knowledge as 'volume'.

The second secret of Knowledge is that you will gain Knowledge by studying
the volumes of the Book of Knowledge.

The third secret of Knowledge is that by invoking the mighty name 
"knowledge" you can find which volumes you have studied, and 
which remain.
volume@blizzard.desc[0]: Here lies &+YVolume_I&N of the &+WBook of Knowledge&N

coffin@blizzard.desc[1]: An ornate coffin is set in the centre of the room.
coffin@blizzard.name: coffin
coffin@blizzard.examine: The coffin has 'MIST' scratched onto the lid.
coffin@blizzard.desc[0]: An ornate coffin is set in the centre of the room.  The coffin is open.

garlic@blizzard.name: garlic
garlic@blizzard.examine:
The garlic seems quite fresh, since it still smells strongly. Because of this,
it might be very good for exorcising vampires.  What do you think the other
players will think of you if you eat it?
garlic@blizzard.desc[0]: Some garlic lies at your feet, its smell wafting upwards.

boulder@blizzard.name: boulder
boulder@blizzard.desc[0]: A huge boulder rests against one of the walls.

statuette@blizzard.name: statuette
statuette@blizzard.desc[0]: A small gold statuette stands here, glittering in the light.

effigy@blizzard.name: effigy
effigy@blizzard.desc[0]: A small stone effigy has been left here.

bridge_wand@blizzard.name: Bridge_Wand
bridge_wand@blizzard.examine:
It has a fiery bridge etched upon one side, apparently a fiery drawbridge
half opened.
bridge_wand@blizzard.desc[0]: A long red wand has been placed here.

platform_altar@blizzard.desc[1]: The platform is uncovered now that the altar is out of the way.
platform_altar@blizzard.name: platform_altar
platform_altar@blizzard.examine: There is a strange brick on the platform.
platform_altar@blizzard.desc[0]: The platform has been moved to the side.

slime_pit@blizzard.desc[1]: There is a pit of slime in the floor.
slime_pit@blizzard.name: slime_pit
slime_pit@blizzard.desc[0]: There is a pit in the floor.

hole_crack@blizzard.name: Hole_Crack
hole_crack@blizzard.examine: How can you examine a hole, there's nothing there to examine!
hole_crack@blizzard.desc[0]: A hole allows you to clamber eastwards.

powerstone1@blizzard.name: powerstone1
powerstone1@blizzard.desc[0]: A magical powerstone has been placed here.

hat@blizzard.name: hat
hat@blizzard.desc[0]: A tall pointed hat of some form has been placed here.

statue_down@blizzard.desc[1]: There is a hole in the roof above you,but it is blocked by the statue's base.
statue_down@blizzard.name: statue_down
statue_down@blizzard.desc[0]: There is a hole in the roof above you.

tube@blizzard.name: tube
tube@blizzard.desc[0]: A long ivory scroll tube has been dropped here.

glittering@blizzard.title: Glittering Cave
glittering@blizzard.description:
You are in a huge glittering cave.  Millions of tiny crystals on the wall
scintilate with rainbows of colors baffling your eyes and mind with a stunning
mass of changing color.  A set of huge steps lead upwards out of the cave, but
only a giant could hope to climb them.

lava_path2@blizzard.title: Lava Path
lava_path2@blizzard.description:
You are at the end of an east-west path. The lava is some distance away from
you here but even so the intense red glow still lights up the chamber and the
heat is scarcely bearable.

passage@blizzard.title: Dark Passage
passage@blizzard.description:
You are following a dark passage which leads north into a brightly lit room
and east-west at a T junction.  The thick dust on the floor shows that you are
the only person to have come this way for a long time.

workroom@blizzard.title: Sorceror's Workroom
workroom@blizzard.description:
You are standing in a circular workroom. The only exit is a western doorway,
through which the temple fire casts its flickering glow across the room.

entrance@blizzard.title: Library Entrance
entrance@blizzard.description:
You are in a small chamber with two high-arched exits leading north and
south.

waterfall@blizzard.title: The Waterfall
waterfall@blizzard.description:
You are in a secluded clearing beside a waterfall which sprays cool water
gently over you.  Several paths diverge here, leading south, east and west.

crypt@blizzard.title: The Crypt
crypt@blizzard.description:
You are in a charnel smelling crypt.  Dark drapes hang between the pillars
that make up the walls.  The whole room has an atmosphere of waiting malignant
evil and an oppressive silence that makes you jump at the slightest draught in
the still, cold air.

elemental@blizzard.title: Elemental Temple
elemental@blizzard.description:
You are in the Temple Of The Elements, surrounded by decorations depicting
Earth, Air, Fire and Water.  This strange icy place gives off a feeling of
unbalance and growing evil.

slime@blizzard.title: Slime Pit
slime@blizzard.description:
You are in the smelly pit which once contained the slime.  The horrible
charnel rotting smell is so strong that you can scarcely keep your stomach
under control.

lava_ledge@blizzard.title: Lava Ledge
lava_ledge@blizzard.description:
You are on a wide ledge looking down on a pool of bubbling lava below. There
is another ledge on the other side.  A crystal bridge spans the pool to the
south.

pass3@blizzard.title: Scree Slope
pass3@blizzard.description:
You are scrabbling for a firm footing on the side of a steep scree slope.
With a lot of effort you could probably make it to the top, but a far easier
route would be south back down the path.  In your effort to stay upright you
almost fail to notice a narrow ravine leading eastwards.

robing@blizzard.title: Robing Room
robing@blizzard.description:
You are in a small robing room which appears to have been unused for quite
some time.  To the south a dark corridor leads east and west into darkness.

pass@blizzard.title: Blizzard Pass
pass@blizzard.description:
You are trudging through deep snow as you follow a narrow track that winds
down the pass leading southward, its end hidden by a succession of rocky spurs
that jut out from either side.  On both sides of you the mountains tower high
above the pass, their peaks veiled in clouds.  At one point, however, the cliff
is nowhere near as steep and a fair way up a single window has been cut,
looking out across the snows.

fissure@blizzard.title: Fissure
fissure@blizzard.description:
You are on a ledge in a huge fissure.  The fissure is so wide that the far
wall is hidden in darkness.  Looking down (a rather bad idea) you can see that
it is just about possible to climb the horrendous distance down to the floor of
the fissure.

woods2@blizzard.title: The Woods
woods2@blizzard.description:
You are in the woods listening to the trees as they rustle in the wind.
There are no visible tracks here, but you could travel through the woods in any
direction, save to the west where thick holly bushes block the route.

blizzard@blizzard.title: Bleak Mountainside
blizzard@blizzard.description:
You are stumbling along the side of the mountain, exposed to the elements
which at most times of the year sweep this area clear of debris.  To the south-
west the slope is almost sheer, while to the east a deep accumulation of snow
is scarred by a deep crevasse.  The snows extend in all other directions save
north, where a lighted inn offers warmth, food, and shelter from the elements.

woods3@blizzard.title: The Woods
woods3@blizzard.description:
You are in the woods, walking amongst the huge trunks watching the birds as
they flit from branch to branch, filling the air with their lively chirping
calls.

bridge@blizzard.title: The Humpbacked Bridge
bridge@blizzard.description:
You are standing on a crumbling humpbacked bridge looking over the side down
onto a wide but shallow stream.  The sun sparkles gently off the ripples as the
stream passes across pebbles and rocks and the fish swim between them. You hear
the faint roar of a waterfall somewhere downstream.
   You can go east or west across the bridge or follow the stream southwards.

dungeon@blizzard.title: Dungeon Corridor
dungeon@blizzard.description:
You are in a low arched dungeon corridor.  The air is dank and musty and an
air of gloom and evil hangs around it.  Rooms to the south and west appear
equally unpleasant and sinister.  A dark passageway leads northwards.
   There is a door to the east.

ruined@blizzard.title: Ruined Temple Hall
ruined@blizzard.description:
You are in a dark rather gloomy temple.  Huge pillars hold up the roof of
this vast chamber and cast strange shadows that seem to dance around you as you
move around.  The center of the temple is a flat platform with a now broken
altar as its centerpiece.

dark_chmb@blizzard.title: Dark Chamber
dark_chmb@blizzard.description:
You are in a dark chamber, which smells of old blood and rotting flesh.
Marks on the floor reveal where old torture equipment one stood.  A single
doorway leads east.

shattered@blizzard.title: Shattered Hall
shattered@blizzard.description:
You are in a shattered hall, scorch marks and strange burns indicate a
tremendous amount of powerful sorcery was used here.  Indeed, sufficient to
blow huge chunks out of the wall.  The passage to the east is now unreachable,
as a huge fissure has opened up in the floor.

snow_temple@blizzard.title: Snow Temple
snow_temple@blizzard.description:
You are in the snowy ruins of an ancient temple.  The view from here is
stunning and very picturesque but the combination of slippery ground and some
steep drops close at hand is enough to dissuade you from sightseeing.

specsimpstudy@blizzard.title: Basic Practice Hall
specsimpstudy@blizzard.description:
The man at the counter turns out to be a tireless teacher.  You and a few
others practice under his wizened eye.  After some time, you begin to get
the hang of it...

treasure@blizzard.title: Treasure Chamber
treasure@blizzard.description:
You are in a treasure storage room.   The high ceiling ensures that no thief
will ever escape without help.  There is a grille in the ceiling, far beyond
your despairing reach.

rune_cave@blizzard.title: &+GRunes&* Cave
rune_cave@blizzard.description:
You are in a large cave.  The rough rocky walls are inscribed with deep
angular runic writings, which appear totally incomprehensible to you.  A
pillared hall stretches off to the west.

lava_led2@blizzard.title: Lava Ledge
lava_led2@blizzard.description:
You are on a ledge looking across a huge pit of flaming lava to another
ledge on the other side.  A passage leads south.  A crystal bridge spans the
pool to the north.

woods@blizzard.title: In The Woods
woods@blizzard.description:
You are in the woods. The great trees cast green shadows across the flowers
and undergrowth as they sway peacefully in the wind.  You can walk in any
direction.

guard2@blizzard.title: Guard Room
guard2@blizzard.description:
You are in a large guardroom.  A set of stairs leads up and down.
A number of zombie guardsmen swarm around you, tearing you mercilessly into
shreds...  In your dying moments you notice another guardroom to the east.

chamber@blizzard.title: Stonewalled Chamber
chamber@blizzard.description:
You are in a small stonewalled chamber.  Light streams in through a somewhat
vandalized window east of you, to the north is a darker chamber only partially
lit, while to the south through a doorway veiled in deep shadow you can see a
dark passage.

dark_cave@blizzard.title: Dark Cave
dark_cave@blizzard.description:
You are in a dark cave with earth walls and a rather low ceiling.  The
earth gives way to stone in the passages leading out of the cave to the east
and west.

catacomb2@blizzard.title: Maze
catacomb2@blizzard.description: You are in a maze of catacombs. Passages lead in all directions.

treravine@blizzard.title: Treacherous Ravine
treravine@blizzard.description:
You are crawling along a narrow treacherous ravine which runs eastwards into
some kind of level area.  Below you could scramble back down to the cliff
window.

moldy@blizzard.title: Moldy Passage
moldy@blizzard.description:
You are in a low passageway.  Mold covers the walls and floor, making it
slippery and quite treacherous.  To the north is a beautiful cave while to the
south the mold gets even thicker.

underruined@blizzard.title: Under the Ruined Temple Hall
underruined@blizzard.description:
You are now under the ruined temple hall. The air here is very musky 
from this chamber not being accessed for several centuries. A flight of
stairs leads down into the ruins of the once great temple.

grassy@blizzard.title: Grassy Clearing
grassy@blizzard.description:
You are in a grassy clearing beside a crystal clear, spring-fed pool that
reflects the swaying trees above.  A sandy path leads north alongside the
burbling stream.

e_pass@blizzard.title: Foot Of The Mountain Path
e_pass@blizzard.description:
You are at the southern end of a path which leads northward into an imposing
range of snow-capped mountains.  To the east the hillside drops rapidly into a
pleasant little valley, while to the west another path winds up the side of a
steep rocky slope.

huge_cav@blizzard.title: Huge Cavern
huge_cav@blizzard.description:
You are in a huge cavern, at the western end.  Some steep rough-hewn steps
lead down into a canyon at one end of the cave and at the bottom faint light
flickers off water.

well@blizzard.title: Dried Up Well
well@blizzard.description:
You are standing at the bottom of a small dried up well.  The walls are
(fortunately) rough enough to make climbing out only slightly harder than
falling in.

canyon@blizzard.title: Canyon
canyon@blizzard.description:
You are at the bottom of a narrow canyon looking across a stream to the far
bank.  Narrow steps wind steeply upwards behind you.  You can easily wade east
across the stream.

crevasse@blizzard.title: Crevasse
crevasse@blizzard.description:
You are standing on the edge of a deep crevasse looking down into darkness.
Heavy snow is piled all around you, partially hiding the distant mountains.
   The snows extend in all direction save east, where the crevasse bars the
route.  You could clamber down into the crevasse but would have great problems
in getting back out of it.

hall@blizzard.title: The Hall Of Fire
hall@blizzard.description:
You are in the hall of fire.  The very walls are tinged with a fiery
radiance, as if the rock itself is burning.  A red pentacle is near one wall
beside a picture carved in the wall.  A lever on one wall is beside a huge
metal drawbridge.  A passage leads east.

rocky@blizzard.title: Rocky Cavern
rocky@blizzard.description:
You are in a large rocky cavern.  From this vantage point at the eastern end
you can gaze almost the full length of the cave, although the far wall fades
into shadows.

restch@blizzard.title: Rest Chamber
restch@blizzard.description:
You are in what appears to have been a large rest chamber of some sort.
There is a great deal of dried blood on the floor here, and several more marks
that seem to indicate the use of sorcery.  A narrow corridor leads north.

catacomb1@blizzard.title: Maze
catacomb1@blizzard.description: You are in a maze of catacombs. Dark shadowy passages lead everywhere.

hut@blizzard.title: The Hermit's Hut
hut@blizzard.description:
This small dank hut appears to have once been the home of a hermit or maybe
even a sorceror of some form, as the rotting junk which litters the floor
contains bits of things you have never seen before.  A narrow doorway leads
south into fresh air.

secret_chmb@blizzard.title: Secret Chamber
secret_chmb@blizzard.description:
You are in low musty chamber concealed down the well.  The chamber is cold
and damp, perhaps as a result of this.

pass2@blizzard.title: The Pass
pass2@blizzard.description:
You are crossing a high pass which separates two of the highest peaks in
the range.  A treacherous-looking ridge leads south, while to the north you can
climb up to the top of the pass.  There is a small cavemouth to the west.

gate@blizzard.title: Gate of Sorcerors
gate@blizzard.description:
You are outside The Gate of Sorcerors.  Its mighty pillars tower up around
you, shielding you from the worst of the regular snowfalls and from some of
the icy winds.  The ancient arched gateway between the pillars leads north into
a wide magically lit passage which disappears into the roots of the earth.
   You may enter the gate to the north, a lighted inn to the east, or trudge
south into the snows.

bottom@blizzard.title: Crevasse Bottom
bottom@blizzard.description:
You are at the bottom of the crevasse.  Daylight, and a great deal of snow,
comes through the top of the crevasse.  A single man-made passage leads east
into a strange temple.  Another passage that doesn't exactly look man-made,
more like a melted tunnel disappearing into the depths, lies west.

shady@blizzard.title: Shady Clearing
shady@blizzard.description:
You are in a shady clearing surrounded by proud and mighty oaks.  The oaks
are surrounded by hollies and thick bushes, while creepers and weeds girdle
their ancient trunks.  There is a route from the clearing to the north and there
is a path that leads off to the east.

corridor@blizzard.title: Corridor
corridor@blizzard.description:
You are in a short section of east-west corridor.  To the west, the corridor
leads to a huge hall, while to the north is a small, dimly lit room.

library@blizzard.title: The Library
library@blizzard.description:
You are in a dusty, bare library.  Hundreds of worm eaten &+Bbookcases&* stand
devoid of all books, their shelves laden only with dust.  An archway leads
north.

ravine@blizzard.title: Ravine
ravine@blizzard.description:
You are on a path climbing up a narrow ravine towards the crumbling remains
of a snow shrouded temple.

laboratory@blizzard.title: Laboratory
laboratory@blizzard.description:
You are in an old laboratory for sorcerous experiments.  Almost everything
to indicate this has been removed, however, leaving only marks in the dust.
There is a door to the north.

gloomy@blizzard.title: Gloomy Room
gloomy@blizzard.description:
You are in a dark gloomy room, light from the window to the south dimly
illuminates one wall.  To the south is another much brighter chamber.

stonewalled@blizzard.title: Stonewalled Passage
stonewalled@blizzard.description:
You are walking along a long and fairly wide stonewalled passage leading
east and west through the mountain.  To the north through a doorway there is
a small room.

lava_cav@blizzard.title: Lava Cavern
lava_cav@blizzard.description:
You are in a huge cavern.  The walls glow and pulse with an intense red
light, reflected up from a river of lava which flows sluggishly westwards at
the south end of the cavern.  Huge explosions of lava regularly light up the
cavern to an extent that the light is almost blinding, accompanied by almost
deafening explosions.  A path leads down almost suicidally close to the lava
river.

narrow_ledge@blizzard.title: Narrow Ledge
narrow_ledge@blizzard.description:
You are in a fissure standing on a terrifyingly narrow ledge.  Above you on
the opposite side is another ledge.  A passage leads back west.

n_pass@blizzard.title: Windswept Ridge
n_pass@blizzard.description:
You are treading cautiously along a narrow ridge which climbs to the north.
The terrain becomes higher increasingly dangerous to the north, while to the
south beyond a scree slope a path descends rapidly into greener country.

stonew_room@blizzard.title: Stonewalled Room
stonew_room@blizzard.description:
You are in a small stonewalled room with a grille in the floor.  A pillared
hall stretches off to the west.

pentacle@blizzard.title: Pentacle Hall
pentacle@blizzard.description:
You are in a huge pillared hall deep within the mountain.  Huge, ornately
carved pillars support the millions of tons of rock above you.  Sinister and
rather ugly gargoyles protrude from the pillars gazing centrally towards a mass
of mystical symbols engraved on the floor.

storage@blizzard.title: Store Room
storage@blizzard.description:
You are in a small rather dirty room which appears to have been a store room
of some kind.  Through a doorway to the south is a corridor.

rocky_can@blizzard.title: Rocky Canyon
rocky_can@blizzard.description:
You are in a rocky canyon beside a deep blue stream.  A narrow crack leads
eastwards into a gloomy, shadowed cave.  You can easily wade west across the
stream.

stream@blizzard.title: Stream Bank
stream@blizzard.description:
You stand on a quiet grassy stream bank.  The water burbles gently past you,
shaded by the thick trees and bushes which grow along the bank.  Towering oaks
cast dark rippling shadows across the almost mirrorlike rippling water which
flickers in the light.  The undergrowth blocks any way southwards along the
stream, but thins out to the north and west where paths lead off.

lava_path@blizzard.title: Lava Path
lava_path@blizzard.description:
You are on a narrow sloping path running uncomfortably close to the lava.
Huge explosions of lava send blasts of intense scorching heat across the path.
The path leads eastwards but the intense red glow and heat haze prevents you
from seeing where to.  A steep climb heads up.

priests@blizzard.title: Priests Room
priests@blizzard.description:
You are in the priests room deep beneath the temple. The crumbling
masonry was once carved with hideous creatures whose incomplete carvings are
still enough to make you shudder and look away. A carved doorway leads
south.

fire_gate@blizzard.title: Fire Gate
fire_gate@blizzard.description:
You are in a large rocky and very uneven cave.  A smooth path has been cut
across the floor permitting easy walking.  The whole cave is filled with a
thundering roar which reaches deep into your mind.  A huge, deep and steep-
walled channel full of lava prevents you from going east through a huge
gateway.

pasture@blizzard.title: Hidden Pasture
pasture@blizzard.description:
You are standing in a small hidden field, its lush grass coated with snow.
The pasture is enclosed on all sides by steep cliffs, save for a small gap to
the west which leads into a narrow ravine.  To the north is an old crumbling
hut of some sort.

window@blizzard.title: Cliff Window
window@blizzard.description:
You are hanging onto a fairly precipitous cliff, beside a rocky window.  Far
below you can see the pass which seems to sway backwards and forwards as the
icy wind tries to tear you away from the cliff and lashes you with huge clouds
of blinding snow.
   The window is west.

pillared@blizzard.title: Pillared Hall
pillared@blizzard.description:
You are in a massive pillared hall decorated with the &+wshields&* of ancient and
long forgotten heroes.  Exits between the pillars lead into several different
caves.

fis_bottom@blizzard.title: Fissure Bottom
fis_bottom@blizzard.description:
You are at the bottom of the fissure.  Precipitous rocky walls reach upwards
hanging over you as if about to crush you.  To the south, the walls vanish
beyond your light without any sign of a break.

s_pass@blizzard.title: Steep Path
s_pass@blizzard.description:
You are trudging along the path.  The towering mountains, their peaks
cloaked in snow, seem to leer down at you as your feet tread the well-worn
track leading steeply northward into the blizzard mountains.  The path
continues north and south.

temple@blizzard.title: The Temple
temple@blizzard.description:
You are in a sinister temple.  Hideous shapes seem to reach out of nothing-
ness towards you and vanish as immaterial shadows.  The whole room radiates a
crushing sense of power filling you with awe and dread.  A huge fire burns at
an end of the temple, seemingly without a source.  Doorways lead lead north
and east.

flickering@blizzard.title: Flickering Passageway
flickering@blizzard.description:
You are in a wide passageway.  To the east is a cave lit by a flickering red
glow.  To the north is a large cave, to the west is a guardroom.

valley@blizzard.title: The Valley
valley@blizzard.description:
You are in a green and fair valley amidst the gently murmuring oaks.  The
sun shines gently through the trees sending dancing, golden beams rippling
across the shadowy grass while midges dance between the branches.  One
particularly large oak tree rises up to the north.

gallery@blizzard.title: Gallery
gallery@blizzard.description:
You are in an ornate gallery which overlooks a wide stone guardroom.  A set
of steps curve steeply down into the guardroom.

limestone@blizzard.title: Limestone Grotto
limestone@blizzard.description:
You are in a beautiful limestone cave.  Multi colored stalactites hang from
the roof forming amazing patterns of brilliant color.  The floor is similarly
decorated with a huge variety of stalagmites.  A man-made corridor leads west,
and a dim and moldy passageway winds southward.

damp@blizzard.title: Large Damp Cave
damp@blizzard.description:
You are in a large cave.  The cave echoes to the dripping of water from its
cold damp roof, thickly coated in algae and mosses.  A pillared hall stretches
off the the east, and a rocky canyon goes west.

throne@blizzard.title: Throne Hall
throne@blizzard.description:
You are in a magnificent throne hall.  The walls and roof are carved and
painted into stunning otherworldly scenes of mystical beasts and magical forms.
Dark curtains cover the walls.

pillared2@blizzard.title: Pillared Hall
pillared2@blizzard.description:
You are in a ornate pillared hall.  The stunning fan vaulted roof would
decorate any cathedral as would the huge pillars that support it.  Exits lead
off in many directions.

large_cav@blizzard.title: Large Cavern
large_cav@blizzard.description:
You are in a large cavern.  Huge stalagmites have grown up almost to the
ceiling, in places actually merging with the multicolored stalactites above.
To the south you perceive a great hall, and a fetid odor comes from the west.
A small, low-walled &+Bwell&* occupies the center of the cave.

messy@blizzard.title: Messy Chamber
messy@blizzard.description:
You are in a large messy chamber.  Several wooden gallows are set across
the damp ceiling and beneath them pools of blood indicate they were not merely
decorations.  A low archway leads north into an unpleasant looking corridor.

guard@blizzard.title: Guard Room
guard@blizzard.description:
You are in a large guardroom lit by a red glow to the east.  A set of stone
steps curve steeply up to a gallery above.  To the west is another guardroom,
although the dim light reveals the presence of many zombie warriors.

specsimp@blizzard.title: Basic Training Center
specsimp@blizzard.description:
As you enter, you notice the wooden floor leading up to a small counter
has been worn smooth by the boot soles of countless adventurers.  A few
leatherbound books, with covers in disrepair, line the strong high shelves on
either side of you.  This must be a place of learning, and from the looks of
it quite a few have been enlightened here. This would be a fine place to
begin putting some tricks up your sleeve...
&+GType '&+Mlearn info&+G'.

stone_cell@blizzard.title: Stone Cell
stone_cell@blizzard.description:
You are in a cold and bare stone cell, scratches on the walls mark where
prisoners have left their last futile marks on the walls.  There is a door to
the west.

dark@blizzard.title: Dark Room
dark@blizzard.description:
You are in a large dark room, passages lead east and west.  A set of
crumbling stone steps leads steeply downwards plunging into the shadows
below.  To the north is a circular looking room.

secret@blizzard.title: Low Secret Passage
secret@blizzard.description:
You are in a low secret passage that leads southward to some kind of dark
pillared room.  The north wall has niches cut into it to allow you to climb
through a hole in the roof above.

catacomb3@blizzard.title: Maze
catacomb3@blizzard.description: You are at a dead end in the catacombs. A passage leads east.

crack@blizzard.title: Narrow Crack
crack@blizzard.description:
You are in a narrow crack, off one side of the fissure.  The walls lean in
at crazy angles making it hard to get through.  A passage leads back north.

r_land@blizzard.title: Rough Land
r_land@blizzard.description:
You are on a patch of rough land to the south of the village.  To the east
is an old, seemingly deserted quarry.  Other paths lead north and west.

shadowy@blizzard.title: Shadowy Corridor
shadowy@blizzard.description:
You are in a shadowy east-west corridor that links two caves.  There is a
door to the south.

narrow@blizzard.title: Narrow Corridor
narrow@blizzard.description:
You are in a low narrow corridor.  To the south is a small chamber while to
the east the passage opens up into a large cave.

landing@blizzard.title: Landing
landing@blizzard.description:
You are on a landing with steep stairs leading both upwards and down.
Below, at the foot of the descending stairs you can see a dark hall and in the
faint light from the rock you can just make out several zombie guards.
A doorway leads east.

rough@blizzard.title: Low, Rough Passage
rough@blizzard.description:
You are in a low rough passage which winds around and is clearly only an
escape route of some form.  A sign hanging on the wall reads in a rather crude
and untidy hand 'DANGER: STORM GIANTS CAN SERIOUSLY DAMAGE YOUR ELF'

store@blizzard.title: The General Store
store@blizzard.description:
A shopkeeper behind the desk is peddling his wares.  Along the walls
of this small room are grains, herbs, fruits, and many assorted
apparatuses of unknown use.  The shopkeeper smiles at you, and says:

"Feel free to browse here.  There are many things for sale, which
you can learn more about by typing 'buy'. Otherwise, type 'buy <item>'"

ogre@blizzard.name: ogre
ogre@blizzard.description: A large ogre wanders past, looking for heads to break.

ghoul@blizzard.name: ghoul
ghoul@blizzard.description: An evil looking ghoul skulks in the shadows.

hermit@blizzard.name: hermit
hermit@blizzard.description: A hungry, unwashed hermit sits here.

giant@blizzard.name: giant
giant@blizzard.description: A giant snores loudly in one corner.

yeti@blizzard.name: yeti
yeti@blizzard.description: A huge, furry yeti rears up threateningly in front of you!

seamas@blizzard.name: seamas
seamas@blizzard.description: Seamas The Leprechaun eyes you cautiously, an evil grin upon his face.

riatha@blizzard.name: riatha
riatha@blizzard.description: Riatha The Acolyte stands arrogantly before you.

teacher@blizzard.name: teacher
teacher@blizzard.description: The bespectacled headmaster, Mortimer, glances up as you approach.

figure@blizzard.name: figure
figure@blizzard.description: A huge magical figure stands on guard.
